title: MDN Web Docs introduces new design, teases paid subscription
content:
MDN Web Docs, previously known as the Mozilla Developer Network, is one of the best documentation sources for web development around. It’s a fantastic resource for learning everything from new CSS properties to the latest APIs for Chrome extensions, and now the site has a brand new look and feel. MDN is also teasing a

The post MDN Web Docs introduces new design, teases paid subscription appeared first on xda-developers.
description: MDN, one of the most popular documentation sites for web development, has a brand new look and a premium subscription on the way.
